# AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.InterpretedSyntax.inlineOnly

**Case**

A syntax value that parses all Markdown text, but interprets only attributes that apply to inline spans.

## Declaration

```swift
case inlineOnly
```

## Discussion

With this syntax, the parser doesn’t apply attributes that differentiate blocks. However, extended attributes apply to inline spans, so the parser includes them, if the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString/MarkdownParsingOptions/allowsExtendedAttributes] property allows them.

## Syntax Values

- **AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.InterpretedSyntax.full**: A syntax value that interprets the full Markdown syntax and produces all relevant attributes.
- **AttributedString.MarkdownParsingOptions.InterpretedSyntax.inlineOnlyPreservingWhitespace**: A syntax value that parses all Markdown text, but interprets only attributes that apply to inline spans, preserving white space.
